thread.title: Leslie Mann Just Had a Major 'Beauty and the Beast' Moment at the Oscars
thread.title_full: Leslie Mann Just Had a Major 'Beauty and the Beast' Moment at the Oscars

title: Leslie Mann Just Had a Major 'Beauty and the Beast' Moment at the Oscars
text: Yahoo   With “Beauty and the Beast” premiering on March 17, everyone’s got the Disney princess on the brain … including Leslie Mann. The actress hit the Oscars red carpet with husband of 20 years Judd Apatow in an almost identical gown to Belle’s. The chartreuse number was designed by Zac Posen — and his inspiration seemed obvious. While Mann looked a lot like Belle, others compared best actress nominee Emma Stone to another “Beauty and the Beast” character, Lumière, the candlestick, in her gold, glittering Givenchy gown. Actress Shay Mitchell also posted a photo of herself resting while getting ready for the Elton John viewing — and wearing a Belle-like yellow gown as well. What do you think about the Oscars “Beauty and the Beast” fever? Follow Yahoo Style on Instagram , Facebook , and Pinterest for nonstop inspiration delivered fresh to your feed, every day.
